analysis.description:
DividendToken.balances (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#182-184) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- constructor (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#201-221)
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#256-288)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#376-399)
	- mint (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#432-445)
	- burn (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#449-462)

CanReclaimToken.reclaimToken (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#130-142) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner(),balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#142)

DividendToken.balanceOf._owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0xe65d38b4b035e0fe9182b2f5f1e8ad5dfa207e9c.sol#290) shadows:
